Orchard

A New Way to Go Solar

It's simple:

Plant

You invest in a Solar Bond that builds community solar fields. Two more words.

Grow

We maintain solar fields that delivery renewable energy to our grid.

Harvest

You earn a great return, plus our community benefits from clean energy.

More solar for your dollar

Looking for the most efficient renewable energy?

Solar panels operating in a solar field are nearly three times cheaper than panels on a roof, according to the National Renewable Energy Laboratory.

You can join us in deploying dependable, cost-effective renewable energy for our grid by investing in community-funded solar fields operated by Orchard.

When you invest in a Solar Bond from Orchard, you're getting the most solar energy for your dollar. We handle the details, while you get a great return on your investment, and our community gets reliable, renewable energy for our grid.

Plant

You invest in a Solar Bond that builds community solar fields. Two more words.
